thread.title: Delhi-NCR weather forecast and warning by IMD: Sudden change in weather; rain, gusty winds lash region, IMD says more showers likely | India News - News9live
thread.title_full: Delhi-NCR weather forecast and warning by IMD: Sudden change in weather; rain, gusty winds lash region, IMD says more showers likely | India News - News9live

author: Dimple Singh
title: Delhi-NCR weather forecast and warning by IMD: Sudden change in weather; rain, gusty winds lash region, IMD says more showers likely | India News - News9live
text: New Delhi: The national capital Delhi and NCR witnessed a sudden change in the weather on Friday night. Gusty winds coupled with rain lashed several parts of the Delhi-NCR, providing relief from the scorching heat. Lightening also struck several areas in Delhi-NCR. According to India Meteorological Department (IMD), gusty winds at 10 pm were reported in several areas of Delhi. In Ujwa, speed of the wind was recorded at 77 kmph, Jafarpur at 57 kmph, Lodhi road at 61 kmph, Pragati Maidan at 63 kmph, Pitampura at 57 kmph, Narayana at 50 kmph and Najafgarh at 40 kmph. https:\/\/twitter.com\/Indiametdept\/status\/1788977154069348502 IMD issues rain alert Meanwhile, the IMD has issued rain alert and cautioned people to stay indoors. "Impact expected over Delhi-NCR and adjoining areas due to duststorm: Strong winds may damage plantation, horticulture and standing crops. Partial damage to vulnerable structures due to strong winds. Minor damage to kutcha houses\/walls and huts. Loose objects may fly," stated the IMD in a post on X. https:\/\/twitter.com\/Indiametdept\/status\/1788971546423255321 Earlier, the IMD had forecasted gusty winds with speed of 50-70 km along with dust storm and rain for Delhi and its neighbouring cities for May 10. "Dust storm\/thunderstorm with rain (followed by rain) and gusty winds with speed of 50-70 Km\/h would occur over and adjoining areas of entire Delhi and NCR ( Loni Dehat, Hindon AF Station, Ghaziabad, Indirapuram, Chhapraula, Noida, Dadri, Greater Noida, Gurugram, Faridabad, Manesar, Ballabhgarh) ,Gohana, Gannaur, Sonipat, Rohtak, Kharkhoda (Haryana) Baraut, Bagpat, Khekra (U.P.) . Light intensity rain\/drizzle would occur over and adjoining areas of Kaithal, Narwana, Rajaund, Assandh, Safidon, Barwala, Jind, Hissar, Hansi, Siwani, Meham, Tosham (Haryana) during next 2 hours," stated the IMD. https:\/\/twitter.com\/Indiametdept\/status\/1788969274381414895 Forecast for other states The IMD had predicted heavy rains in many states of the country including Delhi-NCR from May 9 to 13. The weather department said that the mercury may fall due to rain in North India. Similar weather changes are expected in Uttar Pradesh, Delhi, Bihar, Gujarat and Maharashtra in the next five days.
